about_the_game:
Prepare for the ultimate expedition with the Adventurer’s Arsenal Pack for Dungeon Defenders II! This comprehensive pack comes with gems that allow you to buy cosmetic enhancements to adorn your heroes with, a selection of strategic Shards to bolster your defenses, and the practical additions of an extra bag and an expanded bank vault for all of your storage needs.

To redeem the items contained in the pack, visit and interact with the Mailbox in the Heroes Marketplace or Private Tavern.

This pack contains:

1,650 Gems to purchase Heroes, Flairs, Costumes, and more. (1,500 + 150 Extra Gems!)

1 Inventory Bag to carry more loot (up to a max of 8 bags).

1 Bank Vault to store more items in town (up to a max of 12 vaults).

Five Campaign Shard Packs to equip unique bonuses to your heroes and defenses.
